attributes.action: immediately impose a ban on anybody who has been found to be 'irresponsible' or dishonest over MPs expenses and allowances, as is currently being revealed by The Daily Telegraph, from holding any sort of ministerial or other appointment connected to being an elected member of parliament, pending their standing down at the next general election, or earlier, if they have any morals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people are, at least, thieves, at best, fraudsters.  They should not be allowed to be in charge of ANYTHING involving probity and integrity, as they have none themselves.  Anybody who has been found out to have been milking the system should certainly NOT be allowed to be a contender for the post of Speaker of the House of Commons.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
